content: When I decided I wanted to pursue writing/blogging, I was initially overwhelmed as to how to achieve success. I’ve found that taking it one step, and one post, at a time is helping me to enjoy the process. Each recommend/read/like is like a little badge of encouragement that keeps me going. I’m definitely of the mindset that breaking a task/process down to little parts, and celebrating small successes along the way, is the way for me to achieve my goals.
